languages.text: {n}Офицеры Рэндор и Ксиони Эрэбис складывают аквилы. Их лица покрыты боевыми шрамами, а взгляды полны почтения. Отпрыски рядом — с горящими глазами, явно взращенные в любви к Богу-Императору. Они держатся скромно, но явно очарованы дворцом. Двое старших, судя по мундирам, уже служат в даргонусской страже.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Старшие офицеры-пустотнорожденные Рандор и Ксиони Эрэбис складывают аквилы на груди. Их тела покрыты боевыми шрамами, а взгляды полнятся почтением. Отпрыски рядом — с горящими глазами, скромные, но улыбчивые, взращенные не только в любви к Богу-Императору, но и в строгой заботе. Двое старших, судя по мундирам, уже служат в рядах даргонуской стражи.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Officers Randor and Xioni Erebis both make the sign of the Aquila, reverent expressions on their battle-scarred faces. Beside them are their children. Raised to love the God-Emperor, they are mild-mannered but fascinated by their new surroundings. Judging by their uniforms, the two eldest children are already members of the Dargonus planetary guard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Офицеры Рэндор и Ксиони Эрэбис складывают аквилы. Их лица покрыты боевыми шрамами, а взгляды полны почтения. Отпрыски рядом — с горящими глазами, явно взращенные в любви к Богу-Императору. Они держатся скромно, но явно очарованы дворцом. Двое старших, судя по мундирам, уже служат в даргонусской страже.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The officers Randor and Xioni Erebis both make a sign of Aquila. Their battlescar-covered faces carry a reverent expression. Beside them are their children. Raised in the spirit of love for the God-Emperor but also taken good care of, they're mild-mannered yet smile a lot, and their eyes are alight with excitement. Judging by their uniforms, the two elder ones are already members of the Dargonus Guard.{/n}

{n}The officers Randor and Xioni Erebis both make a sign of Aquila. Their battlescar-covered faces carry a reverent expression. Beside them are their children. Raised in the spirit of love for the God-Emperor but also taken good care of, they're mild-mannered yet smile a lot, and their eyes are alight with excitement. Judging by their uniforms, the two elder ones are already members of the Dargonus Guard.{/n}

{n}Officers Randor and Xioni Erebis both make the sign of the Aquila, reverent expressions on their battle-scarred faces. Beside them are their children. Raised to love the God-Emperor and in a caring environment, they are mild-mannered but quick to smile, and their eyes are alight with excitement. Judging by their uniforms, the two eldest children are already members of the Dargonus Guard.{/n}

{n}Officers Randor and Xioni Erebis both make the sign of the Aquila, reverent expressions on their battle-scarred faces. Beside them are their children. Raised to love the God-Emperor and in a caring environment, they are mild-mannered but quick to smile, and their eyes are alight with excitement. Judging by their uniforms, the two eldest children are already members of the Dargonus Guard.{/n}

{n}Officers Randor and Xioni Erebis both make the sign of the Aquila, reverent expressions on their battle-scarred faces. Beside them are their children. Raised to love the God-Emperor, they are mild-mannered but fascinated by their new surroundings. Judging by their uniforms, the two eldest children are already members of the Dargonus planetary guard.{/n}

{n}Officers Randor and Xioni Erebis both make the sign of the Aquila, reverent expressions on their battle-scarred faces. Beside them are their children. Raised to love the God-Emperor, they are mild-mannered but fascinated by their new surroundings. Judging by their uniforms, the two eldest children are already members of the Dargonus planetary guard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une expression solennelle sur leurs visages marqués par les combats, les officiers Randor et Xioni Erebis font le signe de l'Aquila en signe de respect. À leurs côtés se tiennent leurs enfants, visiblement élevés avec bienveillance et dans l'amour de l'Empereur-Dieu, et fascinés par ce qui les entoure. À en juger par leurs uniformes, les deux aînés sont déjà membres de la garde planétaire de Dargonus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Officers Randor and Xioni Erebis both make the sign of the Aquila, reverent expressions on their battle-scarred faces. Beside them are their children. Raised to love the God-Emperor, they are mild-mannered but fascinated by their new surroundings. Judging by their uniforms, the two eldest children are already members of the Dargonus planetary guard.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une expression solennelle sur leurs visages marqués par les combats, les officiers Randor et Xioni Erebis font le signe de l'Aquila en signe de respect. À leurs côtés se tiennent leurs enfants, visiblement élevés avec bienveillance et dans l'amour de l'Empereur-Dieu. Tout sourire, ils peinent à cacher l'excitation que vous pouvez lire jusque dans leurs yeux. À en juger par leurs uniformes, les deux aînés sont déjà membres de la garde planétaire de Dargonus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los oficiales Randor y Xioni Erebis hacen el signo del Aquila con expresiones reverentes en sus marcados rostros. Les acompañan sus hijos. Criados en la fe del Dios Emperador, son educados, pero les fascina su nuevo entorno. A juzgar por sus uniformes, los dos mayores ya pertenecen a la guardia planetaria de Dargonus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Officers Randor and Xioni Erebis both make the sign of the Aquila, reverent expressions on their battle-scarred faces. Beside them are their children. Raised to love the God-Emperor, they are mild-mannered but fascinated by their new surroundings. Judging by their uniforms, the two eldest children are already members of the Dargonus planetary guard.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los oficiales Randor y Xioni Erebis hacen el signo del Aquila con expresiones reverentes en sus marcados rostros. Les acompañan sus hijos. Criados en la fe del Dios Emperador y en un entorno lleno de cariño, son humildes, de sonrisa fácil y sus ojos están llenos de emoción. A juzgar por sus uniformes, los dos mayores ya pertenecen a la guardia planetaria de Dargonus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ランドール・エレビス士官とシオニ・エレビス士官は、戦いの勲章が刻まれた顔に敬意のこもった表情を浮かべながら、アクィラの印を結んだ。その隣には子供たちが立っている。神帝陛下を敬愛するよう育てられた彼らは、穏やかな性格でありながらも、新しい環境に強く心を惹かれている。着用している制服から見て、その2人の長子はすでにダルゴナスの惑星防衛軍に入っているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Officers Randor and Xioni Erebis both make the sign of the Aquila, reverent expressions on their battle-scarred faces. Beside them are their children. Raised to love the God-Emperor, they are mild-mannered but fascinated by their new surroundings. Judging by their uniforms, the two eldest children are already members of the Dargonus planetary guard.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ランドール・エレビス士官とシオニ・エレビス士官は、戦いの勲章が刻まれた顔に敬意のこもった表情を浮かべながら、アクィラの印を結んだ。その隣には子供たちが立っている。神帝陛下を敬い愛のある環境で育った彼らは、物腰は柔らかいがパッと笑顔を見せて、興奮で目を輝かせている。着用している制服から見て、その2人の長男はすでにダルゴナスの惑星防衛軍に入っているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}兰德尔军官与肖妮军官做了个双头鹰手势，伤痕累累的脸上露出虔诚的表情。他们的孩子跟在他们身边，心里充满了对神皇的虔诚。尽管他们举止谦和，但很显然，周围的一切让他们兴奋不已。从他们的制服来看，他们的大儿子和大女儿已经加入了达戈努斯行星卫队。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Officers Randor and Xioni Erebis both make the sign of the Aquila, reverent expressions on their battle-scarred faces. Beside them are their children. Raised to love the God-Emperor, they are mild-mannered but fascinated by their new surroundings. Judging by their uniforms, the two eldest children are already members of the Dargonus planetary guard.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}兰德尔军官与肖妮军官做了个双头鹰手势，他们伤痕累累的脸上露出虔诚的表情。他们的孩子跟在他们身边，孩子们在充满爱的环境中长大成人，心里充满了对神皇的敬爱。他们举止温和，满面笑容，目光中闪烁着兴奋的光芒。从他们的制服来看，他们的大儿子和大女儿已经加入了达戈努斯行星卫队。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Offiziere Randor und Xioni Erebis machen beide das Zeichen des Adlers, mit ehrfurchtsvollem Ausdruck auf ihren vom Kampf gezeichneten Gesichtern. Neben ihnen stehen ihre Kinder. aufgezogen, um den Gottimperator zu lieben, sind sie sanftmütig und fasziniert von ihrer neuen Umgebung. Ihren Uniformen nach zu urteilen, sind die beiden Älteren bereits Mitglieder der planetaren Wache von Dargonus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Officers Randor and Xioni Erebis both make the sign of the Aquila, reverent expressions on their battle-scarred faces. Beside them are their children. Raised to love the God-Emperor, they are mild-mannered but fascinated by their new surroundings. Judging by their uniforms, the two eldest children are already members of the Dargonus planetary guard.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Offiziere Randor und Xioni Erebis machen beide das Zeichen des Adlers, mit ehrfurchtsvollem Ausdruck auf ihren vom Kampf gezeichneten Gesichtern. Neben ihnen stehen ihre Kinder. In liebevoller Umgebung aufgezogen, um den Gottimperator zu lieben, sind sie sanft und lächeln häufig, und ihre Augen leuchten vor Aufregung. Ihren Uniformen nach zu urteilen, sind die beiden Älteren bereits Mitglieder der planetaren Wache von Dargonus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Randor ve Xioni Erebis adlı subaylar, Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıyor. Savaşta yaralanan yüzlerine hürmetkâr bir ifade hâkim. Yanlarında çocuklar duruyor. Yüreklerinde Tanrı İmparator sevgisiyle yetiştirilen çocuklar, yumuşak huylu olsalar da yeni ortamları karşısında büyülenmiş bir hâlde. Üniformalarına bakılırsa en büyük iki çocuk, hâlihazırda Dargonus gezegen muhafızı mensubu olmuş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Officers Randor and Xioni Erebis both make the sign of the Aquila, reverent expressions on their battle-scarred faces. Beside them are their children. Raised to love the God-Emperor, they are mild-mannered but fascinated by their new surroundings. Judging by their uniforms, the two eldest children are already members of the Dargonus planetary guard.{/n}
